person1.name: Svetozar Stojkov
person1.text: All praise for Šticko Plast. I ordered zebra curtains from them and they arrived in two days. Speed ​​and quality of service at the level. All the best.

person2.name: Đorđe Krgović
person2.text: I am very satisfied with the service I received for a very affordable price. When I need something related to carpentry again, it will be from Šticko Plast.

person3.name: Nikola Marković
person3.text: Professional team! They furnished my office and after that cleaned everything thoroughly and there was no damage. Kudos to the guys go ahead.

person4.name: Daliborka Pešić
person4.text: I am very satisfied with the service, the ordered door arrived in a couple of days, identical to the one in the picture. Very nice guys, service for ten!

person5.name: Mirjana Živadinović
person5.text: Top service. I am looking forward to cooperating with Šticko Plast again, a warm recommendation from my side, the price-quality ratio is guaranteed.

person6.name: Una Vasić
person6.text: I was looking for quality PVC doors and I received a recommendation to call Šticko Plast. It's an understatement to say that the service is top notch! Kudos to the team.
